repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: The collection contains documents related to the administrative, financial, social and cultural functions of the University of Connecticut League from 1966-1998. Founded "to promote social and friendly relations within, and to provide worthwhile service to the University and community," the UConn League has sponsored a variety of social, cultural, and fundraising events for the local and UConn communities and for its own membership.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The University of Connecticut League, a civic organization organized to benefit members of the UConn community, held its first planning meeting in January, 1966, and continues to exist at the present time. Founded "to promote social and friendly relations within, and to provide worthwhile service to the University and community," the UConn League has sponsored a variety of social, cultural, and fundraising events for the local and UConn communities and for its own membership. Membership in the organization has depended on dues, which have been used to fund a membership directory, newsletter and student scholarships, welcome newcomers to the community, and fund community services selected by the UConn League.

The UConn League builds on a tradition of hospitality at the University of Connecticut, growing out of the Newcomers Club, which started in 1946. Organized around interest groups, special interests committees, and service groups, the UConn League has used a hierarchical system of governance which, although modified at certain points in its history, has included a board of directors, president, treasurer, and secretary. Events and fundraisers sponsored by the organization include formal dinners, bake sales, tag sales, cookbook sales, cooking demonstrations, a crafts festival, a fashion review, and shopping trips.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains documents related to the administrative, financial, social and cultural functions of the University of Connecticut League from 1966-1998.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p: Series I: Administrative Records ( undated, 1966-1998) includes materials related to the governance of the organization, including the constitution, bylaws, organizational descriptions, contracts, job descriptions, manuals, committee reports, publicity materials, correspondence, minutes, and agendas. Minutes and Agendas include any financial records and correspondence mentioned therein, as they correspond to the business of the meetings.

Series II: Financial Records ( undated, 1968-1996) includes budgets, treasurer's reports and financial audits not corresponding directly to the business of UConn League board and general meetings, and administrative documents relating to the organization's finances.

Series III: Activities ( undated, 1968-1995) includes administrative and financial documents that relate to the planning, execution, and analysis of social and cultural fundraisers and events sponsored by the UConn League. The series also includes promotional materials and published reviews.
Series IV: 2006 Addition ( 1998-2003) includes administrative and finacial records accessioned in 2006.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials related to the history of the University of Connecticut's relational and associated organizations. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged topcially and alphabetically therein.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p: Publications have been removed from the collection for cataloging. Publications include The Notebook, Favorite Recipes (Dodd A5693) and At Your Fingertips: a Book of Services for Mansfield Seniors.
Newspapers have been photocopied and the originals disposed of.
Photographs have been separated and placed with like media.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], University of Connecticut League Records. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was donated in installments by the president of the UConn League beginning in September 2002.
